mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id, type, title, money, create_time, update_time, order_id
mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_bill (id, enterprise_id, type, title, money, create_time, update_time, order_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into enterprise_bill
id,
enterprise_id,
type,
title,
money,
create_time,
update_time,
order_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update enterprise_bill
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update enterprise_bill set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from enterprise_bill where 1=1 and enterprise_id=#{eid} and date_format(create_time, '%Y%m') = date_format(curdate() , '%Y%m')
